itunes:title: #136: On Being Triggered (My Repair Episode)
title: #136: On Being Triggered (My Repair Episode)
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Let's talk about what it looks like when we're triggered, how we respond, and healthier next steps to take. This episode is a replacement of the episode aired earlier this week.   RESOURCES MENTIONED  Join our weekly text inspiration list by...
itunes:summary:
Let's talk about what it looks like when we're triggered, how we respond, and healthier next steps to take.

This episode is a replacement of the episode aired earlier this week.

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat
